Sensor Sensor was not found Status XX YY ZZ WW NNNNNNNNN
Greetings! As part of participating in the experiment, you need to pass a special test. During the test, data will be collected from motion sensors. No data other than data from the accelerometer, gyroscope and magnetometer will be collected. 

If you have already passed the test, please send a file with the data collected during the test to the organizer of the experiment.
Time: Sensor info Sensor info not available Name: Max range: Resolution: Power: Min delay: Accelerometer Accelerometer not available Gyroscope Gyroscope not available Magnetometer Magnetometer not available Gravity Gravity not available Linear Acceleration Linear Acceleration not available Rotation Vector Rotation Vector not available Geo Rotation Vector Geomagnetic Rotation Vector not available
Playground The playground is intended for training and testing the authentication system by recording gesture data and their subsequent analysis.
In the training mode, gesture data is simply recorded, without additional verification, allowing to quickly create and modify the user model.
In the control mode, the system reads the gesture data, analyzes them and, upon successful authentication, modifies the user model. Training Control Enter playground
Have fun! First chip Second chip Third chip Fourth chip Fifth chip First checkbox Second checkbox Third checkbox Fourth checkbox Fifth checkbox Normal input Clear input Password input Restricted input
About test Thank you for taking the test! 

You have to complete a number of simple tasks to interact with a mobile device through interface elements. 

As mentioned earlier, while you are taking the test, the application will collect and process information from motion sensors. 

Thanks to the collected and processed information from the sensors of the mobile device, your personal and unique user model will be formed. 

The meaning of the experiment is precisely to find out how unique the user models are and what the effectiveness of the authentication method being developed will be. 

While you were reading this text, the system was working and has already begun to form your unique model. 

However, it needs more information, which it will receive while you complete the tasks. 

Completing tasks will not take much time, because the average time to complete all tasks takes about 5 minutes. 

Please note that during the test you need to pass at one time, without switching applications and without turning off the phone! This is due to the fact that your user model changes throughout the all test and will be recorded only at the very end! 

To start the test, as well as to move on to subsequent tasks, please click 'next task' button. The test is completed The last task is to save the test results. Please click on the 'save test results' button. 

The generated model will be saved to a plain text file, for which you can choose the name and folder in which it will be saved. If you have a desire, you can easily get acquainted with the contents of this file. 

After the data is recorded in a file, please send the saved file to the organizers of the experiment. 

Thank you for passing the test! To proceed to the next task, please finish this task completely! In this task, you have to click on the highlighted areas that will appear on the screen. Are you ready? In this task, you will encounter sliders that you have to set to the desired position.
After all the sliders are set to the desired position, you can move on to the next task. Please set all sliders to the correct positions.
After all the sliders are set to the desired position, you can move on to the next task. In this task you have to press all the buttons in a certain order.
However, these buttons are quite far from each other, so you will have to swipe a littleâ€¦
After all the buttons are pressed, you can move on to the next task. Scroll through and click the desired button In this task, you will need to click on the balls that appear as quickly as possible.
Imagine that you are working on a keyboard!
After the counter reaches zero, you can move on to another task. Click on the squares!
Squares left: Set slider to the max value Set slider to the min value Set slider to the middle Set slider to the top Set slider to the bottom Set slider to the middle The button is higher The button is lower The next task button is at the bottom
Stop and continue recording

Are you sure you want to close the application? Are you sure you want to leave the playground? Are you the owner of this device? The device is locked, authentication of the device owner is required! Are you sure you want to interrupt test? Your progress will be reset and the result will not be generated. Sorry, but unfortunately we were unable to record the test results. Please try again or abandon test and contact the organizers of the experiment. The results have been recorded successfully! Please do not forget to send the file you saved to the organizers of the experiment.
